articles.title: Watch Joe Marler score a drop goal and a terrific try in Harlequins Vs Barbarians match | RugbyDump - RugbyDump
articles.description: Using his blinding footwork the front-row stallion sped over the try line in expert fashion.Not settling for just the 5 points, Marler gave the crowd another reason to cheer as he slotted a drop goal conversion.
articles.content: The Harlequins Vs Barbarians match was always going to be a high-scoring affair. The coloured quarters have averaged some of the highest-scoring statistics in the premiership over the past few years,… [+1192 chars]

articles.title: Sadio Mane: Senegal forward to miss World Cup due to injury suffered playing for Bayern Munich - Sky Sports
articles.description: Senegal forward Sadio Mane is out of the World Cup due to a leg injury he sustained while playing for Bayern Munich.
articles.content:
Senegal forward Sadio Mane is out of the World Cup due to a leg injury he sustained while playing for Bayern Munich.
